blogPost.excerpt: Job Description is an AI-based service utilising GPT-3 to generate high-quality professional job descriptions for businesses attracting the best talent. Generate professional job descriptions in seconds. No previous writing experience required.

localize.description: 職位描述是一個基於人工智能的服務，利用GPT-3生成高質量的專業職位描述，爲企業吸引優秀人才。幾秒鐘就能生成專業的職位描述。無需以往的寫作經驗。

next.excerpt: Enombic is a product for designing your own custom stock indexes, investing in them, and sharing them with your friends. Remix the ARK ETFs, market-cap weight the WSB symbols, or "fork" SPY and set your own custom weights. Then, it's one click to invest!
next.title: Enombic - Create your own stock indexes

localize.description: Enombic是一款用于设计自己的自定义股指，投资股指，并与朋友分享的产品。重新组合ARK ETF，市值加权WSB符号，或 "分叉 "SPY并设置您自己的自定义权重。然后，就可以一键投资了!
Enombic是一款用於設計自己的自定義股指，投資股指，並與朋友分享的產品。重新組合ARK ETF，市值加權WSB符號，或 "分叉 "SPY並設置您自己的自定義權重。然後，就可以一鍵投資了!
